title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 80 - Controlled insurers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 80 - Controlled insurers

State Regulations

Subpart 80-1 - Holding companies (§ 80-1.1 to 80-1.9)

Subpart 80-2 - Minimum Standards For Producer-controlled Insurers And Controlling Producers; Disclosure Requirements For Certain Other Producers (§ 80-2.0 to 80-2.6)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 11, ch. IV, subch. A, pt. 80

Statutory authority: Insurance Law, §§201, 301, 308, 309, 310, 1104, 1106;arts. 15, 16, 21

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
